txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.

Wanted: Matted skins from the beasts overrunning the Shire. Bounders are looking for proof of those who are assisting them in keeping the Shire safe. Deliver the items to Hal Hornblower at Hobbiton centre.
'Oh goodness, what is that? It's all stiff and leathery. I guess this is what the Bounders wanted.\n\n'Thank you, kindly.'
'Seems like these are some of the oddest requests that I have ever seen... this one for matted skin from beasts, for instance.'
Hal Hornblower wants matted skins. Hal can be found near the stable in the centre of Hobbiton.
Deliver the matted skins to Hal Hornblower in Hobbiton
You have accepted a task to acquire matted skins for the Bounders of the Shire. They have deputized Hal Hornblower to collect the items near the stables in Hobbiton.
Wanted: Matted skins from the beasts overrunning the Shire.
